headline: Jim Cramer on Micron: “I Think This Stock’s Got $200 Written All Over It”
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer put under the microscope. During the show, a caller asked if it was time for them to sell their position in the stock, and Cramer replied: “No, no, please. We just went through a huge bout of selling in Micron. I talked to Sanjay […]

headline: Micron Technology (MU) Is Up 19.4% After Record Revenue and Dividend Hike - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: Micron Technology recently reported all-time high annual revenue of US$37.38 billion and net income of US$8.54 billion, driven by surging demand for advanced memory solutions in AI and data center markets. An interesting insight is that Micron's strong year-end results were paired with an increased quarterly dividend and guidance for continued robust sales, reflecting both operational momentum and management’s confidence in ongoing growth opportunities. We'll examine how Micron's record...
